name: ASAuthorizationControllerPresentationContextProviding
desc: An interface the controller uses to ask a delegate for a presentation context.

items.name: func presentationAnchor(for: ASAuthorizationController) -> ASPresentationAnchor
items.desc: Tells the delegate from which window it should present content to the user.

items.name: typealias ASPresentationAnchor
items.desc: A platform-specific type that indicates the kind of user interface element to use as a presentation anchor.
